程序包 main.controller

类 TotalScoresController

java.lang.Object
main.controller.TotalScoresController
所有已实现的接口:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class TotalScoresController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
The TotalScoresController class is used to show history scores rankings in the game map set.

  • 字段概要

    字段
    修饰符和类型 字段 说明
    private javafx.scene.control.ListView<java.lang.String> listView
    listview for ranking records
    private javafx.scene.text.Text mapName
    the selected map set name

    search the record file to see if there are history records of the selected map set

  • 方法详细资料

    • initialize

      public void initialize​(java.net.URL url, java.util.ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      The default view is initiated when no map set is selected,
      指定者:
      initialize 在接口中 javafx.fxml.Initializable
      参数:
      url - url location
      resourceBundle - resource bundle

    • defaultMapScores

      void defaultMapScores​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws java.io.IOException
      show the ranking of the default map set.
      参数:
      event - mouse click
      抛出:
      java.io.IOException - if the record file fails loading

    • newMapScores

      void newMapScores​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws java.io.IOException
      show the ranking of the new map set.
      参数:
      event - mouse click
      抛出:
      java.io.IOException - if the record file has IO error

    • showScores

      private void showScores​(java.lang.String mapSetName) throws java.io.IOException
      extracts records of the given map set in the record file and sorted them in descending orders.
      参数:
      mapSetName - given map set name
      抛出:
      java.io.IOException - if the record file has IO error

    • hasRecords

      private boolean hasRecords​(java.lang.String mapSetName, java.lang.String dir)
      search the record file to see if there are history records of the selected map set
      参数:
      mapSetName - the selected map set name
      dir - path of the record file
      返回:
      true if it has history records, false otherwise
